title: Initial Access Using HTML Smuggling & Modern Browsers
subtitle: Crafting safe payloads and defensive counterpoints

content.text:

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Build a benign HTML smuggling sample in a lab.
2. Run it through email and proxy controls, capturing telemetry.
3. Document bypasses and suggest mitigations.
4. Share findings with defenders for rule tuning.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Rehearse before production to surface gaps early.
